participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, enjoys gaming and sports.
participant_1.background: I like to make clothes in my favorite color, blue. I am a police officer who has to run after criminals in my boots, but I still enjoy playing basketball in my free time. Playing quake on slackware linux makes me happy. I aspire to paint murals. My mom is a checker at the local grocery store.

participant_2.name: Maria
participant_2.personality: Creative and family-oriented, values personal expression and strives for self-improvement.
participant_2.background: I am so happy to be close to my parents and my daughters are really excited about our new home. I'm afraid of being judged for my ethnicity. I like to draw and paint in my spare time. I love owning nice office supplies. I am not sure if I am a healthy person, but I know that I am trying my best.

content.text: Not much, just got done drawing a picture. How about you?
Pretty good, just got done playing some quake on slackware linux.
That sounds fun, I've never heard of that game before though.
It's an old school shooter, I really enjoy it. What kind of stuff do you like to draw?
I like to draw portraits of people, and sometimes I do landscapes or abstract art.
That's really cool, I wish I could draw like that. I'm more of a gamer than an artist.
It's just a matter of practice, I'm sure you could get better if you put your mind to it.
I might have to give it a try sometime, I've always admired people who can draw.
You should! It's a lot of fun and it's a great way to express yourself creatively.
I might just do that, thanks for the suggestion.
No problem, I'm always happy to talk about art.
